Posts.Content: 2 weeks after my first FEC cycle my hair has fallen out - the top of my head feels sore, is this normal? and what can I do to relieve the soreness?
Posts.Title: Sore scalp following hair shed

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply - I tried some coconut oil today so fingers crossed. I'm so glad my daughter encouraged me to join this site - it's great to get responses from others going through the same experience. Lots of hugs coming right back at ya!
Posts.Title: Sore scalp following hair shed

Posts.Content: I'm on Amazon as we speak... Thank you so much for your helpful and reassuring reply it so good to know I've joined a community where we all have so much in common. Many Thanks
